```{r install}
install.packages("leaflet")
```

##My Map

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles()
my_map
```

## Markers

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
my_map <- my_map %>%
  addMarkers(lat=43.642567, lng=-79.387054, 
             popup = "CN Tower")
my_map <- my_map %>%
  addMarkers(lat = 43.6424, lng = -79.3860,
             popup = "Ripley's Aquarium")
my_map
```
